text: "Hello Sunshine" is a 2019 song by Bruce Springsteen. It is the leading single from his 19th studio album Western Stars and went to number 16 on the Billboard Hot Rock & Alternative Songs charts. The song influences Jimmy Webb, Glen Campbell and Burt Bacharach musical culture. == References == Category:2019 songs Category:Soft rock songs Category:Country songs Category:Bruce Springsteen songs
title: Hello Sunshine (Bruce Springsteen song)
